name: seetime
0:
”Alexa, turn on the light”
”Alexa,turn off the light”
”Alexa,set the light to blue”
skdetail:
Smart Home Skill. This skill may share device information with Amazon. Learn more.
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Developer Terms of Use
des:
Users need to install Ogemray APP and complete registration. Assign a good name to each smart device and communicate with echo by device name when making a voice command.
The setup steps are as followings:
1. Download APP in Android or iOS APP market.
2. Complete APP registration in APP.
3. You need to have Ogemray smart devices in hand.
4. Configure the devices then set a suitable name.
5. Open Alexa APP, Search skill“seetime”.
6. Enable the skill.
7. Input APP account and password to link account.
8. Search devices in Alexa APP/Smart home.
9. If we set device name as “seetime”, you can try saying following commands to control the device.

As for smart light, set the smart light name as seetime in see time Light APP.
Lighting control:
-You can turn on/off the light: 
“Alexa, turn on the seetime”
“Alexa, turn off the seetime”
-You can change the color: 
“Alexa, set the seetime to red”
“Alexa, set the seetime to green”
-You can change the color temperature: 
“Alexa, set the seetime to warm white”
“Alexa, set the seetime to daylight”

As for Weconn Plug, set the smart plug name as seetime in Wecnn Plug APP.
Plug control:
-Turn on/off the smart plug
“Alexa, turn on the seetime”
 “Alexa, turn off the seetime”


Currently this skill supports following Ogemray products：

-Light series (corresponding APP: see-time Light):
Smart bulb 
Smart alarm lamp
Smart mushroom lamp
Smart colorful glazed lamp
Smart ambient lamp

-Smart plug (corresponding APP: Weconn Plug)
